feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Dense Smoke Advisory issued June 28 at 10:11AM AKDT until June 29 at 1:00PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...DENSE SMOKE ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than one mile in dense smoke. * WHERE...Central Interior. * WHEN...Until 1 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and poor air quality.

entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued June 27 at 1:58PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...POTENTIAL FLOODING OF AREA RIVERS DUE TO ABOVE NORMAL TEMPERATURES... Very warm and well above normal temperatures are expected to continue into mid week. These near record high temperatures will increase snow and ice melt and subsequent water-levels of area rivers including the Chilkat, Klehini, and Taiya.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway

entry.title: High Surf Advisory issued June 27 at 9:30PM SST by NWS
entry.summary: ...A High Surf Advisory remains in effect... * SURF...Surf heights of 11 to 14 feet will continue to impact south and east facing shores. * TIMING...through Tuesday * IMPACTS...high surfs and strong rip currents Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga
entry.cap:areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 2:56PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Breezy and very dry conditions Tuesday. A weather feature moving through the state will promote increased west-southwest winds Tuesday afternoon and evening across much of northwestern and northern Nevada. Winds will increase throughout the day on Tuesday reaching 15 to 25 mph with gusts of 30 to 35 mph Tuesday afternoon and evening. The breezy winds will combine

entry.title: Fire Weather Watch issued June 28 at 1:57PM MDT until June 29 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Hot temperatures are expected in the upper 90s to low 100s while relative humidities fall to low 20s to upper teens.
